title: Rename obfuscated names with .NET Reflector?
content:
I have some obfuscated C# .NET code I want to analyze.



Is it possible to rename those obfuscated symbols? So I can more easily track them? Like IDA Pro can work with renaming functions and so forth.

answers_data.content: Some plugins like reflexil provide this functionality.

comments.text: You should probably comment on how it does it and what a result might look like.
